body.name: Stroller Fan Portable Bladeless Fan ​Mini Handheld Fan with Flexible Tripod Clip on Stroller Fan 3 Speeds Rechargeable Battery Operated Fan for Stroller, car Seat, Crib, Bike and Desktop (black)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 23 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: 【NEWLY DESIGNED JELLYFISH FAN IN 2021】The deformed small jellyfish fan can bring you a cool feeling anytime, anywhere. It can stand on the desktop, can be carried in the hand anytime and anywhere, and can be wound and hung on the stand. There are three types of high, medium and low wind speeds that can be adjusted. The first gear is for sleeping wind, the second gear is for natural wind, and the third gear is for strong wind.

【BUILT-IN POWERFUL LITHIUM BATTERY】Baby stroller fan is powered by USB and uses the latest version of the motor to ensure a long battery life. It can be charged by computers, laptops, mobile power supplies, car chargers, etc. The built-in rechargeable lithium-ion battery has a real capacity of 2000mAh, not a fake capacity. It takes 3.5 hours to fully charge, and work for 2 to 10 hours depends on the wind speed.

【SAFETY FAN DESIGN】The concealed turbofan blades and small network ports are used for safety design, so you don't have to worry about gripping your hands. The bladeless fan is equipped with the latest professional brushless motor, which can rotate at high speed and generate greater airflow, but with low noise. A small fan suitable for babies. Babies are safer and mothers are more comfortable.

【UNIQUE APPLICATION SCENARIO】The tripod made of silicone resin material is easy to deform and use. You can bend it in strollers, umbrellas, desks, outings, outdoor sports, indoors, offices and camping, or hang it on the handle of the car. It is very convenient and quick to use.

【EVERYTHING YOU GET】You will get 1* new small jellyfish fan, 1* USB charging cable, 1* product manual, 1* exquisite gift box packaging and our 24-hour service. If you have any questions about the product, please feel free to contact us.

productInformation.value: #13,235 in Baby (See Top 100 in Baby) #28 in Baby Stroller Cooling Fans

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Second one worked great!
reviews.reviewText: Edit: The company reached out to me and sent a replacement. We used it on a beach trip last week and it worked great! We used it every day, in the car and at the beach. The charge lasted great, and it kept our baby cool. Would definitely recommend.I bought this to use at the beach, out at the pool, or on my baby’s stroller. I used it once when we were at the pool. It worked okay, it died after probably 3 hours of use. I charged it when I got home, then the next time we went to use the fan it only stayed on for about 2 minutes and we haven’t been able to get it to turn on again since.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Nice color speeds for the fan durable legs that stay in place it's pretty quiet no loud noise or clicking battery life last for quiet awhile I think this was a good buy and would recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works when it wants to UPDATE
reviews.reviewText: I bought this fan to be safe for little fingers when in the stroller. However it only works sometimes. It can be fully charged and I’ll turn it on and it will run for a minute and then stop. I’ll have to hit the power button numerous time and it will come back on for a moment and then shut off again. I’ve missed the return window sadlyUPDATE: I forgot to post this, but the company reached out to me after I posted the above review and offered to replace it. The new one has worked very well and we’ve had no issues! Truly appreciate a company that stands by their products. I have updated the stars to reflect. The only complaint is I wish the battery lasted longer but overall, it’s been a good fan!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 21, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Who doesn’t love a cool, fun and bendy fan?
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. It took me a while to write this review because I originally bought this for my child. I could have bought a regular fan but I didn’t want her tiny fingers to get stuck on the fan blades so I wanted a safer portable fan for her. I waited until the HEAT wave arrived to really test this product out. If you live in the USA this week has been a real scorcher. Some states had temperatures of 110! Crazy!So yeah I put the fan on her stroller, in the car, in a shopping cart, on hand or on a table. I couldn’t be any more ecstatic! Truly a great invention.The blades are all blocked off so tiny little hands can’t touch the blades. It has three modes when it turns on: slow, medium and super fast. It’s still pretty refreshing and powerful even for a tiny little thing. It’s pretty sturdy, flexible and bendable.I love that I can just set it and forget it. It’s not that loud on level 1, and it’s louder on level 2 but honestly I can’t hear it that much when other noises in the background. But by no means can I consider it silent at all. If you’re in your car you probably won’t notice the noise. We forgot the fan in the car when we got out to go grocery shopping and didn’t find out until I placed my child back in her car seat. So that should give you some sort of hint of noise level. I think you can only hear it if you’re at home and it’s super quiet. I think the greatest thing of all is how cool is it looks because it really doesn’t look like a fan. I got lots of compliments on it and asked where i got it from.I made a video so you can hear the noise level.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great fan… but it is top heavy and the battery life is just okay.
reviews.reviewText: I’ve used this for the past 4 months now that we are in summer And use it on the weekends and it works great! Love that you can attach it to any stroller or chair and even use it on a table top. The COMPLAINT I have is the battery life is poor. It doesn’t last at all. Now, I’ve come to realize my charging cable they provide is no longer charging it, so that may be why it’s not working at full capacity but I can’t find any other charger to fit it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Favorite Portable fan for our stroller!
reviews.reviewText: We love this. Moves a lot of air and keeps our child cool in their stroller!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for the gym
reviews.reviewText: I am using this to cool while using treadmills or elliptical machines.It works great: it latches into the bars easily, is powerful, can change the direction, is still small enough to carry, and has good battery life (so far I've used it about 2 hours at the highest setting without charging).I especially love the ability to use usb-c charging and that it looks like a war of the worlds tripod.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Small but heavy
reviews.reviewText: Not light weight. Makes a bit of noise. Will be good for use on stroller this summer.

reviews.reviewTitle: Perfect for a stroller and the baby
reviews.reviewText: Love that it has 3 settings and also the blades are not reachable by a baby so perfect for a stroller!
Une bonne grosseur pour le bureau de travail. 3 vitesses qui sont très pratique. Elle est très mignonne. Je l'adore !!!

reviews.reviewTitle: Silencioso pero dura muy poco la bateria
reviews.reviewText: Tiene 3 niveles de aire, el tercero sí echa suficiente brisa. La batería dura muy poco, para una tarde solamente o tres ratitos.

reviews.reviewTitle: Don’t be fooled by its looks!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my daughter’s stroller bassinet. It is heavy and keeps falling as the head of the fan weighs it down. I had to keep checking on it as it kept falling.There is no power off button , you have to keep pressing the same button 3-4 times torun all the speeds and then the fan turns off. The power on button is pushed in the fan body which makes it hard to press the button. And lastly, the battery of this fan sucks.I woulnt recommend this stroller fan when there are others out in the market which are cheaper and functional.
